com.googlecode.cqengine.quantizer

Class FloatQuantizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.quantizer.FloatQuantizer

  • public class FloatQuantizer
extends Object
    A static factory for creating Quantizers for Float attributes.

    See withCompressionFactor(int) for details.

    Author:
    Niall Gallagher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Quantizer<Float> withCompressionFactor(int compressionFactor)
      Returns a Quantizer which converts the input value to the nearest multiple of the compression factor, in the direction towards zero.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • withCompressionFactor

        public static Quantizer<Float> withCompressionFactor(int compressionFactor)
        Returns a Quantizer which converts the input value to the nearest multiple of the compression factor, in the direction towards zero.

        Examples (compression factor 5):

        • Input value 0.0 -> 0
        • Input value 4.2 -> 0
        • Input value 5.0 -> 5
        • Input value 9.9 -> 5
        • Input value -0.0 -> 0
        • Input value -4.2 -> 0
        • Input value -5.0 -> -5
        • Input value -9.9 -> -5
        Parameters:
        compressionFactor - The number of adjacent mathematical integers to coalesce to a single key. Supply a factor < 2 to disable compression and simply truncate everything after the decimal point
        Returns:
        A Quantizer which converts the input value to the closest multiple of the compression factor, in the direction towards zero
